name: Racing Car Pursuit
description:
Racing Car Pursuit is a new endless racing game with realistic driving simulations and high graphics quality. Run away from Police with impressive racing cars and overtake the traffic from first person perspective! A whole city for you.
Beat your friend's high score with Gamecenter Leaderboard system and unlock new race cars with coins!

Racing Car Pursuit will be updated constantly.

Features

- 3D realistic cockpit view
- 3D realistic environment
- High quality graphics with dynamic reflections
- Ultra realistic car physics
- Endless game mode
- Different vehicles to choose
- Awesome Race car driving experience
- Rich types of randomly generated NPC traffic including trucks and buses
- Realistic sounds
- Online Leaderboard
- Free to play

Tip

-Tilt your device to drag your car, to accelerate and brake touch the pedal buttons!

Racing Car Pursuit is awesome driving simulation, download it for free and play with your friends!
